information.01:
This device is a Raspberry Pi serving these web pages which display sensor inputs, and controls various outputs.

As well as these pages, this server generates a dynamic JSON file which can provide the sensor table. This is available at:
information.02: This web software has been created by Bernard Czenkusz using the skipole framework. Further details of the framework can be found at: skipole.bitbucket.io The 'rempi' project development repository is here: https://bitbucket.org/skipole/rempi
